targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroup(attempt_time, $group_time, 0) AS "time", COUNT(method) AS "password" FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE method = 'password' and dst_port = 22 and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() group by 1 order by 1 asc

SELECT $__timeGroup(attempt_time, $group_time, 0) AS "time", COUNT(method) AS "pubkey" FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE method = 'publickey' and dst_port = 22 and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() group by 1 order by 1 asc

SELECT $__timeGroup(attempt_time, $group_time, 0) AS "time", COUNT(method) AS "password-2222" FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE method = 'password' and dst_port = 2222 and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() group by 1 order by 1 asc

SELECT $__timeGroup(attempt_time, $group_time, 0) AS "time", COUNT(method) AS "pubkey-2222" FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE method = 'publickey' and dst_port = 2222 and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() group by 1 order by 1 asc

SELECT $__timeGroup(attempt_time, $group_time, 0) AS "time", COUNT(method) AS "password-222" FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE method = 'password' and dst_port = 222 and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() group by 1 order by 1 asc

SELECT $__timeGroup(attempt_time, $group_time, 0) AS "time", COUNT(method) AS "pubkey-222" FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE method = 'publickey' and dst_port = 222 and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() group by 1 order by 1 asc

SELECT $__timeGroup(attempt_time, $group_time, 0) AS "time", COUNT(method) AS "telnet" FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE method = 'password' and dst_port = 23 and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() group by 1 order by 1 asc

SELECT attempt_time, attacker_ip, attacker_version, login, password FROM ssh_login_attempt where method = 'password' and dst_port = $dashboard_port and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() order by id desc
SELECT latitude, longitude, attacker_ip, e.asn as "ASN", e.as_ as "AS", count(id) as "attempts" FROM ssh_login_attempt a join ip_entry e on e.ip = a.attacker_ip group by 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
SELECT login as name, COUNT(id) as value FROM ssh_login_attempt where method = 'none' GROUP BY 1 order by 2 desc
SELECT password as Name, COUNT(id) as Value FROM ssh_login_attempt where password is not NULL and length(password) > 0 GROUP BY password order by 2 desc
select password as value, length(password), count(id) from ssh_login_attempt WHERE password is NOT NULL group by 1, 2 order by length(password) desc limit 50
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE (method = 'password' OR method = 'publickey') LIMIT 50
SELECT MAX(attempt_number) FROM ssh_login_attempt LIMIT 50
SELECT count(distinct attacker_ip) FROM ssh_login_attempt
SELECT COUNT(distinct login) FROM ssh_login_attempt LIMIT 50
SELECT COUNT(distinct password) FROM ssh_login_attempt
SELECT attacker_version, COUNT(id) FROM ssh_login_attempt where method='connect' or attacker_version = 'telnet' GROUP BY attacker_version order by 2 desc
SELECT login || ':' || password as name, count(id) as value FROM ssh_login_attempt where password is NOT NULL and length(password) > 0 group by 1 order by 2 desc
SELECT length(password) FROM ssh_login_attempt where password is not NULL order by 1 asc
SELECT attacker_ip, COUNT(id) FROM ssh_login_attempt WHERE method = 'password' GROUP BY attacker_ip order by 2 desc
SELECT 'AS' || e.asn || ' ' || e.as_ as "AS", count(id) as "attempts" FROM ssh_login_attempt a join ip_entry e on e.ip = a.attacker_ip where method = 'connect' group by 1 order by 2 desc
SELECT country_name, count(id) as "attempts" FROM ssh_login_attempt a join ip_entry e on e.ip = a.attacker_ip where method = 'connect' group by 1
SELECT attempt_number FROM ssh_login_attempt where method = 'password' and attempt_number > 1
SELECT ':' || dst_port, count(id) as "attempts" FROM ssh_login_attempt a where (method = 'connect' or attacker_version = 'telnet') and attempt_time between $__timeFrom() and $__timeTo() group by 1
SELECT cert, count(id) FROM ssh_login_attempt where method = 'publickey' group by 1 order by 2 desc

list.definition: select distinct dst_port from ssh_login_attempt order by 1 asc
list.label: Port
list.name: dashboard_port
list.query: select distinct dst_port from ssh_login_attempt order by 1 asc
